## How to run platformio tools:

1. Run using absolute path:

   ~/.platformio/penv/bin/platformio run

2. Or better init penv once per session:

   . ~/.platformio/penv/bin/activate

## Arduino Framework for Espressif devices

prefer pioarduino github repo over the default one
